message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $95 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I understand that $98 is still a bit lower than my target price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another compromise. I can sell it to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell it to you for $109.
